channel.title: Script to find a dtm click and repeat
channel.description: Well I was wondering if anyone can make ma a basic script all I want it to do is start off with doing holdmouse(1011, 41, true) MoveMouse(1014, 204) ReleaseMouse(1014, 204, true) Then find a dtm on the page and click it with like a wait(5000) before it clicks the dtm again so the page has time to load. The dtm moves around randomlly which is why I put the hold mouse and stuff. So basically I want it to move the bar down then find the dtm click it and repeat if anyone could help me it would be appreciated :P.

i.e. ClickMouse(x,y+50);

item.source: Script to find a dtm click and repeat

item.title: Script to find a dtm click and repeat
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

Try this out real quick, tell me if it works.

[scar]
program clickthatshit;

Var
Ok, OkClicks : integer;
x,y : integer;

Const
WaitTime=2000; //set to how long you want to wait before each click
//on the ok. Its at 2 seconds at the moment.
//-------------------------------------------------------------//
Procedure LoadBMP;
Begin
ok:= BitmapFromString(24, 7, ‘z78DAED924D92C4200885AF84041’ +
‘596A072FF233589A46B7A919EAA590F0B2AF5E4E7F3193FAAAA3A’ +
‘0074FB9299CB3B3F29EFBC1CA88FEF0A3C8417445EBEA96AAFC6F’ +
‘18D5A230F35479A4ADEA50ECE9A4220239552572878B84CA7CA2A’ +
‘770D8A146F1DAC25736962E7AE26B06B1E79A07466AFCC2326880’ +
‘DF5CE73901F6DDA915497BE028E356959CBF054368FCDB566F4C2’ +
‘69C6E583C81AF3E6C121B8BB9C5A7DB407B2779384A7167374CED’ +
‘39FAA9CB766C1D172FB56D21F343E6592955DB77E6EDF3CDB939F’ +
‘841847F40B0F92E87D8BBD11CA644BE76B5B46F152A6186E34E18’ +
‘F97BDE67FE64345EF7FA08DF079532161904339B8C27FFC295EFF’ +
‘0ED5FA’);
End;
//-------------------------------------------------------------//
Procedure Clicking;
Begin
ClickMouse(1011, 41, true);
MoveMouse(1014, 204);
ReleaseMouse(1014, 204, true);
End;
//-------------------------------------------------------------//
Procedure ClickIt;
Begin
LoadBMP;
If(FindBitmap(Ok,x,y))Then
Begin
ClickMouse(x-5,y+10,True);
OkClicks := OkClicks +1
End;
End;
//-------------------------------------------------------------//
Procedure Progress;
Begin
Writeln(’=================BY JUNIOR==================’);
Writeln(’============================================’);
Writeln(‘Clicked “OK!” ‘+IntToStr(OkClicks)+’ times! ‘);
Writeln(’============================================’);
End;
//-----------------------MAIN LOOP-----------------------------//
//-------------------------------------------------------------//
Begin
ActivateClient;
Wait(3000+Random(2000));
Clicking;
Repeat
Wait(WaitTime);
ClickIt;
Wait(1000+Random(500))
Clicking;
Until(isFKeyDown(8))
If(isFKeyDown(8))Then
Begin
FreeBitmap(Ok);
Progress;
End;
End.
[/scar]

EDIT: And what is this for? I want to try it.

Read full topic

item.title: Script to find a dtm click and repeat
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

Fresh off SCAR… here it is!
Tell me if this is what you wanted, or what you want me to change.
Edit: and fix line 10 and insert your own wait time, and this script will stop when you hit F8

[scar]
program clickthatshit;

Var
Ok, OkClicks : integer;
x,y : integer;

Const
WaitTime=2000; //set to how long you want to wait before each click
//on the ok. Its at 2 seconds at the moment.
//-------------------------------------------------------------//
Procedure LoadBMP;
Begin
ok:= BitmapFromString(24, 7, ‘z78DAED924D92C4200885AF84041’ +
‘596A072FF233589A46B7A919EAA590F0B2AF5E4E7F3193FAAAA3A’ +
‘0074FB9299CB3B3F29EFBC1CA88FEF0A3C8417445EBEA96AAFC6F’ +
‘18D5A230F35479A4ADEA50ECE9A4220239552572878B84CA7CA2A’ +
‘770D8A146F1DAC25736962E7AE26B06B1E79A07466AFCC2326880’ +
‘DF5CE73901F6DDA915497BE028E356959CBF054368FCDB566F4C2’ +
‘69C6E583C81AF3E6C121B8BB9C5A7DB407B2779384A7167374CED’ +
‘39FAA9CB766C1D172FB56D21F343E6592955DB77E6EDF3CDB939F’ +
‘841847F40B0F92E87D8BBD11CA644BE76B5B46F152A6186E34E18’ +
‘F97BDE67FE64345EF7FA08DF079532161904339B8C27FFC295EFF’ +
‘0ED5FA’);
End;
//-------------------------------------------------------------//
Procedure Clicking;
Begin
ClickMouse(1011, 41, true);
MoveMouse(1014, 204);
ReleaseMouse(1014, 204, true);
End;
//-------------------------------------------------------------//
Procedure ClickIt;
Begin
LoadBMP;
If(FindBitmap(Ok,x,y))Then
Begin

ClickMouse(x-5,y+10,True);
OkClicks := OkClicks +1
End;
End;
//-------------------------------------------------------------//
Procedure Progress;
Begin
Writeln(’=================BY JUNIOR==================’);
Writeln(’============================================’);
Writeln(‘Clicked “OK!” ‘+IntToStr(OkClicks)+’ times! ‘);
Writeln(’============================================’);
End;
//-----------------------MAIN LOOP-----------------------------//
//-------------------------------------------------------------//
Begin
ActivateClient;
Wait(3000+Random(2000));
Clicking;
Repeat
Wait(WaitTime);
ClickIt;
Clicking;
Until(isFKeyDown(8))
If(isFKeyDown(8))Then
Begin
FreeBitmap(Ok);
Progress;
End;
End.
[/scar]
